alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:17PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, northwestern West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erwinville, or 11 miles south of New Roads, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Roads, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Morganza, Ramah, Erwinville and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 134 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
